channel.title: Original Half Life no longer censored in Germany
channel.description:
[url]https://www.pcgamesn.com/half-life/half-life-not-censored-germany[/url]
Link has video of changes, it's teh funneh.
snip Rather infamously, the original Half-life was heavily censored in Germany. The version released over there was quite drastically-overhauled to suit entertainment guidelines at the time, but that’s now been lifted. It only took nearly two decades.

item.title: Original Half Life no longer censored in Germany
item.dc:creator: lambdaman
item.description:
i kinda liked the super robo hl1 because it was just so silly :>

when I see this I’m reminded of how Australia got the uncensored L4D2 in 2014, everyone was so happy

Read full topic
